Name: 古代从军/Ancient military
About the game: Wanli Korean War, the classic and famous battle of Ming Dynasty, we all know the story of resisting the United States and aiding Korea, but you know, China also fought the War of Resistance against Japan and aiding Korea, but this story happened in the Wanli Period of Ming Dynasty, known as wanli Korean War. The game to the Ming Dynasty as the game period, players from a soldier to kill the enemy to promotion, experience the ancient battlefield pride. Character level increased In the game, characters need to constantly improve their own level need to click on the road of the army, challenge the monster of different levels, levels need to constantly kill the enemy to complete the clearance. How to become more powerful [/] Talent system The game has a talent system, which can increase the character attributes of the talent, each talent corresponding to different attributes, such as: wild blood corresponding to the role attack. Equipment function Equipment can be obtained from the military road level, and every time you complete a level battle, there is a chance to drop different levels of equipment, equipment has character attribute bonus, can help you easily complete the level. Lottery system Characters in the game can get rare props and fashion through the lottery system, pay attention to the lottery system needs to top up the way to draw oh! check-in Each player will check in once a day, and each check in will receive a corresponding reward, which is generally conducive to the character's rapid development. Office system The official system of the game can improve the combat effectiveness of the characters, and the official will get the corresponding official clothes in the fashion column when reaching certain requirements Gameplay Prepaid phone function There is a function of recharge in the game, recharge can get the corresponding gold ingot, gold ingot can be used for lottery, gold ingot can only be obtained by recharge. The investment system Players can use gold ingot to invest, investment according to your level 8 times return the amount of ingot corresponding to your investment, note that the return of ingot is silver ingot. Ranking system The ranking system is based on the player's strength to rank, respectively, the level ranking and battle ranking, ranking can see the strength of different players, so that they can be compared with players.
